metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18484 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in cp-demangle.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++ demangling functions provided by libiberty, and there is a stack consumption problem caused by recursive stack frames: cplus_demangle_type, d_bare_function_type, d_function_type.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2018-12697 to CVE-2018-12700

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
